message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you may have.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $15,000 is closer to my bottom line. Could you meet me halfway at $13,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I am still unable to meet you at $13,500. My maximum offer is $12,000, which is closer to my budget. I hope we can come to an agreement.
